oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Avrami Kinetics of Dynamic Recrystallization in Cadmium
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SARKAR, A
CHAKRAVARTTY, JK
SAMAJDAR, I
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: behavior
steels
metals
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The application of the Avrami kinetics to study the evolution of dynamic recrystallization (DRX) in cadmium (Cd) is examined. The study involves compression testing of Cd over a range of temperatures and strain rates and flow curve analysis using a recently developed modeling technique. It is demonstrated that the Avrami relation is suitable to study the progress of DRX in Cd in a manner similar to that in various steels for which the concept was originally developed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: METALLURGICAL AND MATERIALS TRANSACTIONS A-PHYSICAL METALLURGY AND MATERIALS SCIENCE, 41A(10), 2466-2470
